Name: Faircroft’s Antiques: Home for Christmas
About the game: Mia Faircroft is Home for Christmas! Explore her hometown in this wonderful Hidden Object game, perfect for the season. Play over 30 fun minigames, restoring one piece of art at a time! Search through detailed locations, fix up worn antiques, and save the holidays for the community of Mikamaw Point!
